text.tspan: The patient presents with acute bronchitis, likely of viral
origin, as the primary acute concern. Hypertension is noted to
be well-controlled on the current medication regimen. Obesity
is present with a BMI of 32.5, which may be contributing to
overall health issues. Hyperlipidemia remains stable on current
statin therapy. The patient's anxiety disorder shows a mild
exacerbation. Vitamin D deficiency has been identified, and
supplementation will be initiated. Sleep disturbance is noted,
likely due to the combination of cough from bronchitis and
